price: 14. Smeek niet om één vernietiging maar smeek om vele vernietigingen.
arabic: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā tadʿū al-yawma thubūran wāḥidan wa-id'ʿū thubūran kathīran
